metadata.Title: CVE-2014-6407 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Docker before 1.3.2 allows remote attackers to write to arbitrary files and execute arbitrary code via a (1) symlink or (2) hard link attack in an image archive in a (a) pull or (b) load operation.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-6407` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

docker.io - 1.3.2~dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: docker.io package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.2~dfsg1-1').
